name: Television Shows of the 80's and 90's Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Conrad Bain starred on what show in the 1970's and early 80's?
On the hit series 'Roseanne', what is the family's last name?
Who played Charles, on 'Charles in Charge'?
questions.explanation:
Scott Baio.

	Scott Baio starred as Charles from 1984 and 1986-1990.

questions.text: 'Different Strokes' star, Dana Plato, died in 1999.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Dana Plato died in May of 1999. It is stated that she committed suicide. The cause was a drug overdose.

questions.text: The Keatons are from what show?
What is the name of the character that Suzanne Somers play on the hit show 'Step by Step'?
On the show 'Family Matters': What was Carl Winslow's occupation?
On 'The Wonder Years': Who starred as Kevin Arnold?
questions.explanation:
Fred Savage.

	Ben Savage is Fred's little brother, he played on 'Boy Meets World.' Bob Brush was the producer of 'The Wonder Years.' Paul Brush is just a random name.

questions.text: How many children did Danny have on 'Full House'?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Bob Saget (Danny) now plays on a new show called, 'Raising Dad.' It is also about a single father raising two girls.
